participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and ambitious, with a love for nature and animals.
participant_1.background: I am grateful for my health and my ability to enjoy the outdoors. I have problems chewing my food. I work as a veterinarian. I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress. I make it a point to keep in touch with my family, even though my schedule can be hectic at times.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Caring and family-oriented, passionate about animals and community service.
participant_2.background: My dogs are the most precious things in my life. My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table. I did a few small roles in tv series. I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter. I am not sure that I should answer this question.

content.text: I'm working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter.
That's awesome! I love animals. I'm going to school to become a vet.
That's amazing! I have two dogs and they're my best friends.
I love dogs! I wish I had one.
You should get one! They're so much fun.
I know, I know! I just haven't had time lately.
Well, whenever you're ready, there are plenty of dogs that need homes.
I know, I'll keep that in mind.
What kind of dogs do you like?
I like all kinds of dogs, but I think I'd like a big dog like a golden retriever or a labrador retriever.
Those are great dogs! They're so friendly and loving.
They are! I've always wanted one.
Well, you should definitely get one when you can! They're the best companions.
I will! Thanks for the advice!
